The SVG file has been successfully created at `./sunset.svg`. To embed it in an index.html file for visibility, you can add the following HTML snippet:

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Sunset Through Mountains</title>
</head>
<body>
    <svg href="path/to/sunset.svg" width="100%" height="100%">
        <!-- Draw sunset elements here -->
    </svg>
</body>
</html>
```
